answers.answer: It really all depends on where the baby is laying and how strong your uterus is. I wouldn't worry too much. Many women don't feel their second baby until the 5th or 6th month. It is not the same with all women and you might not feel the baby until he/she gets a little larger or moves position.
hi there...na not nessecarily you wont feel movements yet..give 2 more weeks and if you dont feel anything see you midwife...do you have 1 yet?...
Even in a 2nd pregnancy it is completely normal not to feel movements until anywhere between 18-24 weeks.  If it concerns you bring it up with your doctor

question: hi now i'm in 2nd pregancy.now i'm in 17th week preganancy. still i didn't feel any baby kicks or movements in my belly. should i worry?for my first son, i felt baby movements at the end of fifth month.but all of friends told that movements ill feel in earlier. but i didn't. i had diabetes during this preganancy (Trace),RBS: 110. pls give suuggestions.
title: fetel movements
